column1: Uchi////Incredible presentation and food fusion.  While this is a Japanese sushi house
column2: I recommend you go off the beaten path and order everything but traditional sushi.  We started with a sushi roll
column4: but everything else we had was a true experience.  Fried sweetpotatoes come out as tempura goodness
column5: a great way to start the meal.  Most everything is served "tapas" style and meant for sharing. Sweet potatoes and a sushi roll is how we started our evening
column7: tempura fried with a sweet apple chutney
column8: followed by  eggplant sashimi- it was sweet and delcious (even for the eggplant haters
